product name: Hair Treats Moist Maintain Conditioner For Extensions
product description: Specially formulated for hair extensions and wigs, HT Moist Maintain is water- based and will not adversely affect or alter any chemical treatments. Its unique formulation gives it an initially alkaline pH, thus allowing opening of the cuticles and penetrating deep into the cortex. While the hair is drying, the formula neutralizes itself back to its natural pH level. The now more acidic composition closes the cuticle, locking-in emollients. The unique formula is originally designed to tackle the most dry, damaged hair and split ends. It is traditionally used for hair that's been permed, tinted, or subjected to salt and chlorine. product name: LAKME TEKNIA PERFECT CLEANSE SHAMPOO 1000 ML
product description: 1. PRODUCT INFO:Micellar shampoo. Gently gives the hair and scalp a deep wash. Micelles capture residues and impurities without damaging the fiber. Detox action. Prevents lime from water getting trapped in the hair.2. FOR WHOM / USE :Micellar shampoo for all hair types3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :● Gently gives the hair and scalp a deep wash ● The micellae capture the residue and impurities, keeping the structure of the hair intact ● Prevents lime from water getting trapped in the hair4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :Hair needs to be deeply cleansed because of a build up of residue owing to the regular use of styling products, impurities in the environment or excess grease generated by the scalp.PERFECT CLEANSE deeply cleanses the hair and scalp, protecting it from impurities, grease and minerals from hard water that can stick to the hair. Micelles that are often used in skin cleaning products are incorporated into this shampoo to achieve a deep and delicate clean that is soft on the hair fiber, leaving its structure unaltered. It is enriched with an infusion of Mediterranean fruit acids, lemon extracts, red grape and apple, that work on three levels: detoxifying, natural hydration and protection from hard water.

product description: 1. PRODUCT INFO :Protection shampoo. Gently cleans and the acidic pH closes the hair cuticle.Prolongs the qualities of the color and delays the loss of pigments. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :Colored hair has had its natural state altered. It is therefore essential that it is given a care routine that provides external protection. The objective is to protect the color for as long as possible.The first step is to wash hair with warm water a sulfate-free shampoo that prevents color fading. The second step is to protect and keep the hair conditioned and hydrated. Its acidic pH formula closes the scales of the cuticle and protects the cortex from external damage. The infusion of organic acai and sunflower seed extract act as a powerful antioxidant that protects colored hair from the effects of the sun, loss of color and free radicals.

product name: TEKNIA BODY MAKER SHAMPOO 1000 ML
product description: 1. PRODUCT INFO: Volume shampoo. Gently cleans. Volumizes and strengthens the hair from within. Creates a natural thickness and lightness. Stronger resistance to breakage.  2. FOR WHOM / USE  Volume shampoo for fine hair  3.FOR WHAT / BENEFITS?  - Rebuilds hair fiber from within, offering a lasting effect. Recharging effect - More resistant hair that feels thicker, more voluminous and shinier  4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION : Fine hair can seem thick when it is washed and air dried, but it loses body and goes “flat” when it is straightened or dried with a hair dryer. Fine hair is fragile and prone to breakages when it is over worked. It often lacks volume when ineffective products are applied. It is advisable to use products that are quickly absorbed andthat don’t leave residues or a thick layer on the hair.BODY MAKER takes care of and treats fine hair. The essential, natural components based on organic soya bean and rice microproteins acts as reconstruction blocks for the fiber. Fine hair becomes resistant to breakages and there is a recharging effect that creates a feeling of thickness, volume and natural shine.

Volume and light as a feather.2. FOR WHOM / USE : Light volume balm for fine hair3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS : ● Rebuilds hair fiber from within, offering a lasting effect. Recharging effect● More resistant hair that feels thicker, more voluminous and shinier4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION : Fine hair can seem thick when it is washed and air dried, but it loses body and goes “flat” when it is straightened or dried with a hair dryer. Fine hair is fragile and prone to breakages when it is over worked. It often lacks volume when ineffective products are applied. It is advisable to use products that are quickly absorbed andthat don’t leave residues or a thick layer on the hair.BODY MAKER takes care of and treats fine hair. The essential, natural components based on organic soya bean and rice microproteins acts as reconstruction blocks for the fiber. Fine hair becomes resistant to breakages and there is a recharging effect that creates a feeling of thickness, volume and natural shine.

product name: LAKME TEKNIA FULL DEFENSE SHAMPOO 1000 ML
product description: 1. PRODUCT INFO : Protective shampoo. Gently cleanses stressed hair and scalp from atmospheric and domestic pollution. Protects hair fiber from dryness, resulting in shiny, soothed and healthy hair.2. FOR WHOM / USE : Protective shampoo for stressed hair3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :● Total, effective protection of the structure of hair fiber. Prevents pollutants from getting trapped in hair. Moisturizes and reduces the oxidative damage of UV rays. ● Nourished, moisturized and shiny hair. Clean, pollutant-free hair. Healthy look.4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION : Pollution and UV rays impact the hair as well as the skin. They are the most exposed areas of our bodies. We protect our skin from damage and our hair should receive the same attention, because when it’s not protected, it’s vulnerable. Minute toxic particles can easily penetrate the hair fiber and they can cause drynessand breakages.The toxic content in the air is not only a threat in exterior spaces. Internal pollution of houses is also considered damaging. It could come from domestic appliances, tobacco smoke, or from the blue light of electronic device screens.These circumstances cause stress to the hair. The key is to follow a care routine that keeps the hair well hydrated by deeply conditioning it and protecting it with serums and oils. Lakmé has gone even further and designed FULL DEFENSE, a range of products that not only protect stressed hair, but that acts as a total protection screen against the harmful effects of our surroundings.

product name: 1.5'' Highlight Sleek N' Straight 18" Clip-In Extensions
product description: Every woman should own a couple packs of these, use these extensions to  add volume or length, or use them to accentuate up-do's.  PRODUCT FEATURES: This pack comes with 2 clip   in extensions HOW TO USE:  With a comb or your finger,   separate a section of hair with a hair clip.Clip up the rest of your   hair above your head.Align the strip of the   extension at the root of your sectioned part, and slip in all the   pressure-sensitive clips.Snap shut to secure. Remove   the hair clips holding the rest of your hair to release your own hair over   the extensions, and style as desired.When extensions are not   being worn, attach a loose elastic, or wrap in a loose braid to avoid the   extensions from getting tangled when stowed away.When washing extensions, rub   hair between hands smoothly using a hydrating shampoo. Apply conditioner,   then blow dry set on low pressure.INGREDIENTS: 100% human hair ABOUT THE BRAND: Our mission is to bring to the professional Hair Beauty market, the  latest innovations in products. Launched in 2010, Hair Treats began with its  unique professional line of double loop technology hair extensions, which is a  non-aggressive system that gives you fantastic results instantly. You can now  create any vision in mind, and make it a reality with just the click of a  button and then a pinch of a plier. Hair Treats Extensions uses only 100% human remy  hair collected by Indian temples, and delivered in a manner where the hairís  cuticles remain in the same direction. With 10 application systems to choose from,  different textures, and up to 40 colors, the possibilities are endless.
